items.title: Ukraine 'ready for elections' if partners guarantee security, Zelensky says
items.description: He was speaking after US President Donald Trump repeated claims Kyiv was "using war" to avoid elections.

items.title: Judge rules Epstein grand jury records from 2019 case can be released
items.description: A federal judge says materials from the investigation can be unsealed because of a new law passed by Congress last month.

items.title: Sophie Kinsella, author of the bestselling Shopaholic series, dies aged 55
items.description: The author of the Shopaholic series of novels had been diagnosed with an aggressive form of brain cancer.

items.title: British paratrooper who died in Ukraine named
items.description: Sir Keir Starmer pays tribute to Lance Corporal George Hooley, who the Ministry of Defence says died in a "tragic accident" away from the front lines.

items.title: WTA signs with Mercedes in 'most significant deal in our history'
items.description: The Women's Tennis Association announces a long-term partnership with Mercedes-Benz that has the potential to be the largest in women's sport.
